paragraphs.content: A Song and Psalm for the sons of Korah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: A Song and Psalm for the sons of Korah.

paragraphs.content: Great is the LORD, and greatly to be praised in the city of our God, in the mountain of his holiness.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Great is the Lord, and greatly to be praised in the city of our God, in the mountain of his holiness.

paragraphs.content: Beautiful for situation, the joy of the whole earth, is mount Zion, on the sides of the north, the city of the great King.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Beautiful for situation, the joy of the whole earth, is mount Zion, on the sides of the north, the city of the great King.

paragraphs.content: God is known in her palaces for a refuge.
paragraphs.contentHtml: God is known in her palaces for a refuge.

paragraphs.content: For, lo, the kings were assembled, they passed by together.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For, lo, the kings were assembled, they passed by together.

paragraphs.content: They saw it, and so they marvelled; they were troubled, and hasted away.
paragraphs.contentHtml: They saw it, and so they marvelled; they were troubled, and hasted away.

paragraphs.content: Fear took hold upon them there, and pain, as of a woman in travail.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Fear took hold upon them there, and pain, as of a woman in travail.

paragraphs.content: Thou breakest the ships of Tarshish with an east wind.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou breakest the ships of Tarshish with an east wind.

paragraphs.content: As we have heard, so have we seen in the city of the LORD of hosts, in the city of our God: God will establish it for ever. Selah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: As we have heard, so have we seen in the city of the Lord of hosts, in the city of our God: God will establish it for ever. Selah.

paragraphs.content: We have thought of thy lovingkindness, O God, in the midst of thy temple.
paragraphs.contentHtml: We have thought of thy lovingkindness, O God, in the midst of thy temple.

paragraphs.content: According to thy name, O God, so is thy praise unto the ends of the earth: thy right hand is full of righteousness.
paragraphs.contentHtml: According to thy name, O God, so is thy praise unto the ends of the earth: thy right hand is full of righteousness.

paragraphs.content: Let mount Zion rejoice, let the daughters of Judah be glad, because of thy judgments.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let mount Zion rejoice, let the daughters of Judah be glad, because of thy judgments.

paragraphs.content: Walk about Zion, and go round about her: tell the towers thereof.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Walk about Zion, and go round about her: tell the towers thereof.

paragraphs.content: Mark ye well her bulwarks, consider her palaces; that ye may tell it to the generation following.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Mark ye well her bulwarks, consider her palaces; that ye may tell it to the generation following.

paragraphs.content: For this God is our God for ever and ever: he will be our guide even unto death.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For this God is our God for ever and ever: he will be our guide even unto death.
